debutant.solution: Attack the transition point between chopper's forehand and backhand
Move chopper in and out to give dead balls to a side with long pips

intermediaire.probleme: Serving short and returning short serves
intermediaire.solution: Serve short and return short serves back short to prevent looping

intermediaire.probleme: Going to the stronger looping side
intermediaire.solution: Go to looper's weaker side to bring him out of position

exercices_complementaires.description: Attack wide forehand and backhand corners, especially if opponent has trouble with these shots

exercices_complementaires.nom: Testing short balls to forehand down the line
exercices_complementaires.description: Test opponent's ability to return short balls to forehand down the line, and camp out on this side for the return if it works

erreurs_a_eviter.solution: Play to opponent's weak sides instead
